A year on, Turkey earthquake survivor counts losses of life and limbAbdulalim Muaini lies in bed looking at pictures of his children and wife who died next to him in the earthquake one year ago, contemplating how it shattered the new life they had built in southern Turkey after having fled war in Syria. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 10:08:47 GMT第2244章https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/year-turkey-earthquake-survivor-counts-losses-life-limb-2024-02-01/Umit Bektas, Ceyda Caglayan世界中东
U.S. investor Calvey pleads guilty to Russian embezzlement charge -Ifax cites courtA Russian court of cassation on Thursday said U.S. investor Michael Calvey had pleaded guilty to embezzling 2.5 billion roubles ($27.7 million), the Interfax news agency reported. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 09:49:42 GMT QLFQ46DB2RP5HA4MYQN5MUHBAY https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/us-investor-calvey-pleads-guilty- Russian-embezzlement-charge-ifax-cites-court-2024-02-01/Reuters商业金融
Polish PM says there is no "Plan B" on EU aid for UkrainePolish Prime Minister Donald Tusk said on Thursday there was no "Plan B" on European Union aid for Ukraine and Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban who is stalling it must decide if Hungary is "part of our community". Thu, 01 Feb 2024 09:25:37 GMT DLYOKBRMQ5ISTCOE5DVGQTXWNE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-pm-says-there-is-no-plan-b-eu-aid-ukraine-2024-02-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Red Sea disruption threatens Italy's economic stability - ministerOngoing disruption in the Red Sea threatens to destabilise Italy's economy and marginalise ports in southern Europe, Italy's defence minister said on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 09:24:13 GMT 26QXKE7Z4NJM5K3YDDKU3WLNPU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/red-sea-disruption-threatens-italys-economic-stability-minister-2024-02-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Ex-PM Imran Khan's leak of secret cable hurt Pakistan - court rulingFormer Pakistani prime minister Imran Khan's leaking of a secret diplomatic cable hurt the South Asian nation economically, politically and diplomatically, said a detailed court judgment issued on Thursday after a guilty verdict that sentenced him to 10 years in jail. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 08:43:06 GMT DN33FXQ4INLPZGUZOCDPN2AVZU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ex-pm-imran-khans-leak-secret-cable-hurt-pakistan-court-ruling-2024-02-01/Asif Shahzad世界亚太地区
Exclusive: Iran's Guards pull officers from Syria after Israeli strikesIran's Revolutionary Guards have scaled back deployment of their senior officers in Syria due to a spate of deadly Israeli strikes and will rely more on allied Shi'ite militia to preserve their sway there, five sources familiar with the matter said. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 08:38:45 GMT ZGWZWK72HFL33MSOUL65ZZFTNU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/irans-guards-pull-officers-syria-after-israeli-strikes-2024-02-01/Reuters世界中东
Farmers hurl eggs and stones in Brussels as EU summit beginsFarmers threw eggs and stones at the European Parliament on Thursday, starting fires near the building and setting off fireworks amid protests to press a summit of European Union leaders to do more to help them with taxes and rising costs. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 08:32:03 GMT S3THWOFWIVPJDEN75IGEGKJJXI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/angry-farmers-descend-brussels-take-protest-eu-summit-2024-02-01/Erol Dodrudogan, Yves Herman世界欧洲
Estonia's PM Kallas says EU should agree to a long-term aid package for UkraineEuropean Union member states should agree to a long-term aid package for Ukraine, Estonia's prime minister Kaja Kallas said on Thursday ahead of the summit regrouping leaders of the 27 EU member countries on the subject. Taiwan elects parliament speaker ruling party views as pro-ChinaTaiwan's parliament on Thursday elected a former presidential candidate for the largest opposition party as its new speaker, who will be responsible for hosting visiting foreign lawmakers and who the ruling party has said is pro-China. North Korean delegation to visit Moscow, Russian lawmaker saysA North Korean delegation will visit the lower house of Russia's parliament on Feb 13, state news agency RIA quoted a deputy from the opposition Communist Party as saying on Thursday. The fisherman from Senegal keeping Spain's vessels afloatWatching news of Senegalese migrants arriving on the Canary Islands stirs memories for Babou Diouf of the same perilous journey he undertook 17 years ago and his arduous path to his new home - Burela, on Spain's northern coast. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 08:04:54 GMT KV46BHDWKVJHBJ2KZQSAGAJXUU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/fisherman-senegal-keeping-spains-vessels-afloat-2024-02-01/Nacho Doce, Charlie Devereux世界欧洲
